Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma will be pleased with the team’s performance.
A high standard for the rest of the tournament, all of which will be held in the Caribbean, has been set.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had no trouble adapting to conditions in the West Indies
It was an authoritative performance with bat and ball.
Suryakumar Yadav’s 28-ball 53 laid the winning template.
